channel.title: Small problem with my GUIrun server
channel.description:
i know you all probably think im incredibly newby, but im new to this, so...
when i run my GUIrun server it comes up with this: [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/9/guirunproblem.png/][IMG]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/5006/guirunproblem.png[/img]
i was wondering if there is anyway i can make it say: server listening on port .............
the ............. is my no-ip.biz one, so it can go online
so basically i need to change the 0.0.0.0 to my no-ip.biz, if anyone can help me
post here or PM me
thanks

item.title: Small problem with my GUIrun server
item.dc:creator: @idk_how idk how...
item.description:
@idk_how wrote:

cheers i done it, but now, it runs right, i changed it in client folder too, so it runs on my no-ip on client too, but it says error connecting to server, anyone help now?

thanks btw
